scripts.jshint: node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint www && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint src && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint tests
scripts.setupIonicCordova: cd examples/ionic-cordova; npm install; ionic cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-appsflyer-sdk --save; ionic cordova platform rm android; ionic cordova platform rm ios; ionic cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-appsflyer-sdk --save; ionic cordova platform add android; ionic cordova platform add ios
scripts.runIonicCordovaIos: cd examples/ionic-cordova; ionic cordova prepare ios; ionic cordova run ios;
scripts.runIonicCordovaAndroid: cd examples/ionic-cordova; ionic cordova prepare android; ionic cordova run android;
scripts.setupCordova: cd examples/cordova; npm install; cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-appsflyer-sdk --save; cordova platform rm android; cordova platform rm ios; cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-appsflyer-sdk --save; cordova platform add android; cordova platform add ios
scripts.runCordovaIos: cd examples/cordova; cordova prepare ios; cordova run ios;
scripts.runCordovaAndroid: cd examples/cordova; cordova prepare android; cordova run android;
